name: Odd-mensional
description:
It was an ordinary day when Spindigy and her friends Coochie and Pasghetti walked through the forest of their strange world.
Suddenly, a hyperdimensional vortex opened just ahead, pulling them all into the unknown!
In the blink of an eye they found themselves trapped in a whole new world, full of dangers and traps... will they be able to escape?

CONTROLS

Arrows = Move
Z = Change character
X = Action 1
C = Action 2
Enter = Confirm
